tool_description: Translate Plus API delivers lightning-fast and precise multilingual translations. Harness real-time translation, language identification, and text-to-speech conversion to effortlessly integrate dependable translation capabilities into your applications. Effortlessly extend your global presence with our robust documentation and wide-ranging language support.
name: Translate Plus
title: Translate Plus

api_list.name: translate

required_parameters.name: target_lang
required_parameters.description: enter language code of target language ( you can get language code here : https://cloud.google.com/translate/docs/languages)

api_list.name: detect

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Please provide the text for which you want to detect the language.
